languages.text: "Если бы я рассказала вам обо всем напрямую, вы бы стали... скажем, соучастни{mf|ком|цей}. Но так как заветные слова не прозвучали из моих уст — вы, гипотетически, согласились бы лишь помочь мне отбить несколько контейнеров. А если бы ажи вдруг решили спутать наши планы — всех пустотных псов спустили бы на меня. Я искренне желала оградить вас от лишнего беспокойства, шерин. Клянусь Великим!"

"If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"
languages.original_text: "Если бы я рассказала вам обо всем напрямую, вы бы стали... скажем, соучастни{mf|ком|цей}. Но так как заветные слова не прозвучали из моих уст — вы, гипотетически, согласились бы лишь помочь мне отбить несколько контейнеров. А если бы ажи вдруг решили спутать наши планы — всех пустотных псов спустили бы на меня. Я искренне желала оградить вас от лишнего беспокойства, шерин. Клянусь Великим!"

languages.text: “如果我把所有真相都告诉了你，你就会变成我的……这么说吧，我的同谋。但只要我没有说出那些不正当的言论，那你仅仅是答应帮我拿回几个集装箱而已。这样一来，就算不知哪里来的鬼怪打算破坏我们的计划，那些该死的猎犬也只会针对我一个人。我真诚地希望你不会惹上任何不必要的麻烦，亲爱的。我对至高无上的神皇发誓！”
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: “如果我把所有真相都告诉了你，你就会变成我的……这么说吧，我的同谋。但只要我没有说出那些不正当的言论，那你仅仅是答应帮我拿回几个集装箱而已。这样一来，就算不知哪里来的鬼怪打算破坏我们的计划，那些该死的猎犬也只会针对我一个人。我真诚地希望你不会惹上任何不必要的麻烦，亲爱的。我对至高无上的神皇发誓！”

languages.text: «Si le hubiera dicho esto directamente, se hubiera convertido en... supongo que cómplice sería la palabra. Pero, al no haber dicho nada por el estilo, usted solo se comprometería a ayudarme a recuperar una serie de contenedores. Y si algún azhi decidiera echar por tierra nuestros planes, los perros del vacío solo buscarían mi rastro y no el suyo. Mi único objetivo era evitarle problemas innecesarios, shereen. ¡Lo juro por el Exaltado!».
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

Mi único objetivo era evitarle problemas innecesarios, shereen. ¡Lo juro por el Exaltado!».

languages.text: 「もしあたしがアンタに直接話していたら…アンタはいわゆる共犯者になっていたはずさ。でも、そういう不正な言葉をあたしは使わなかった。だから、アンタはコンテナをいくつか奪還するのを手伝うことに同意しただけってこと。そして、もしアジーが急にアタシらの計画を阻止しようと決断しても、虚空の猟犬どもが放たれるのはアタシに向けてだけだ。どうしたって、アンタを不要なトラブルから守りたかったんだ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓ってね！」
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: 「もしあたしがアンタに直接話していたら…アンタはいわゆる共犯者になっていたはずさ。でも、そういう不正な言葉をあたしは使わなかった。だから、アンタはコンテナをいくつか奪還するのを手伝うことに同意しただけってこと。そして、もしアジーが急にアタシらの計画を阻止しようと決断しても、虚空の猟犬どもが放たれるのはアタシに向けてだけだ。どうしたって、アンタを不要なトラブルから守りたかったんだ、シャリーン。エグザルテッド・ワンに誓ってね！」

languages.text: « Si je vous l'avais dit directement, vous seriez {mf|devenu|devenue}... complice, si l'on peut dire. Mais puisqu'aucune parole illicite n'a franchi mes lèvres, hypothétiquement, vous accepteriez simplement de récupérer quelques conteneurs, voilà tout. Et si les azhi se mettaient en tête de contrecarrer nos plans, alors c'est sur moi et sur moi seule que tous les chiens du vide seraient lâchés. Tout ce que je voulais, c'était vous protéger, shereen. Je le jure sur l'Exalté ! »
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: « Si je vous l'avais dit directement, vous seriez {mf|devenu|devenue}... complice, si l'on peut dire. Mais puisqu'aucune parole illicite n'a franchi mes lèvres, hypothétiquement, vous accepteriez simplement de récupérer quelques conteneurs, voilà tout. Et si les azhis se mettaient en tête de contrecarrer nos plans, alors c'est sur moi et sur moi seule que tous les chiens du vide seraient lâchés. Tout ce que je voulais, c'était vous protéger, shereen. Je le jure sur l'Exalté ! »

languages.text: "Hätte ich es Euch direkt gesagt, hättet Ihr Euch ... sagen wir mitschuldig gemacht. Doch da mir diese schlimmen Worte nicht über die Lippen gekommen sind, würdet Ihr rein hypothetisch nur zustimmen, mir bei der Wiederbeschaffung einiger Container zu helfen. Und würden die Azhi sich plötzlich entscheiden, unsere Pläne zu durchkreuzen, würden alle die Leerehunde nur auf mich gehetzt werden. Mein aufrichtigster Wunsch war es, Euch vor unnötigem Ärger zu bewahren, Shereen. Ich schwöre es beim Erhabenen!"
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

I swear by the Exalted One!"

languages.text: "Açık seçik söyleseydim işte o zaman... Tabiri caizse suça ortak olmuş olurdun. Ancak ağzımdan yasa dışı bir şey çıkmadığından, aslen kaybettiğim birkaç konteyneri yeniden bulmama yardım etmiş oluyorsun. Ayrıca azhiler bir anda planımıza köstek olmaya karar verirse o uçsuz itlerinin hedefinde sadece ben olurum. Yani tek arzum, başını gereksiz yere derde sokmaktan kaçınmaktı şirinim. Görkemli şahidim olsun!"
languages.original_text: "If I had told you directly, you would have become... shall we say, complicit. But since those illicit words did not escape my lips, you would hypothetically be agreeing merely to help me recapture a few containers. And if the azhi suddenly decided to thwart our plans, then all the void dogs would be unleashed on me alone. My sincerest wish was to protect you from any unnecessary trouble, shereen. I swear by the Exalted One!"

traits.locale_text: "Sana doğrudan söylemiş olsaydım, o zaman seni de suça ortak etmiş olurdum. Oysa yasalara aykırı bir şey olduğu ağzımdan çıkmasaydı, teoride sadece kaybettiğim birkaç konteyneri yeniden bulmama yardım etmeyi kabul etmiş olurdun. Olur da azhiler bir anda tüm planlarımıza köstek olmaya karar verseydi, o hâlde o uçsuz itlerinin hedefinde sadece ben olurdum. Sadece senin başını gereksiz yere derde sokmak istemedim şirinim, bunu tüm samimiyetimle söyleyebilirim. Görkemli şahidim olsun!"
